issue.title: Atlas v4 has a wry2 joint

content.raw:
My robot collapsing with our gazebo launch was due to trying to load our atlas_v4_no_wry2 model on start up (specified by default on robot interface computer). 
 (Continually switching API and models between robot and simulation is not fun.)
content.html: My robot collapsing with our gazebo launch was due to trying to load our atlas_v4_no_wry2 model on start up (specified by default on robot interface computer). (Continually switching API and models between robot and simulation is not fun.)
